verses.verse: וְזֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> ve-Zot likewise הַמִּצְוָ֗ה <S%H4687><s%> ham-mitz-Vah, Now these [are] the commandments הַֽחֻקִּים֙ <S%H2706><s%> ha-chuk-Kim the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <S%H4941><s%> ve-ham-mish-pa-Tim, and the judgments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוָּ֛ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God לְלַמֵּ֣ד <S%H3925><s%> le-lam-Med to teach אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem; לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot you that ye might do בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz, [them] in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you עֹבְרִ֥ים <S%H5674><s%> 'oe-Rim whither ye go שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> le-rish-Tah. to possess

לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an so תִּירָ֜א <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra That thou mightest fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God לִ֠שְׁמֹר <S%H8104><s%> Lish-mor to keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all חֻקֹּתָ֣יו <S%H2708><s%> chuk-ko-Tav all his statutes וּמִצְוֹתָיו֮ <S%H4687><s%> u-mitz-vo-Tav and his commandments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוֶּךָ֒ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha which I command אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וּבִנְךָ֣ <S%H1121><s%> u-vin-Cha thee thou and thy son וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> u-ven- and thy son's בִּנְךָ֔ <S%H1121><s%> bin-Cha, son כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei all the days חַיֶּ֑יךָ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yei-cha; of thy life וּלְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> u-le-Ma-'an so יַאֲרִכֻ֥ן <S%H748><s%> ya-'a-ri-Chun may be prolonged יָמֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mei-cha. and that thy days

וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֤ <S%H8085><s%> ve-sha-ma'-Ta Hear יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El therefore O Israel וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H8104><s%> ve-sha-mar-Ta and observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot, to do אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that יִיטַ֣ב <S%H3190><s%> yi-Tav [it] that it may be well לְךָ֔ le-Cha, וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher after תִּרְבּ֖וּן <S%H7235><s%> tir-Bun with thee and that ye may increase מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; mightily כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber hath promised יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God אֲבֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-cha of thy fathers לָ֔ךְ Lach, אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz thee in the land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> za-Vat that floweth חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash. and honey פ Peh

שְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> she-Ma' Hear יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; O Israel יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu our God יְהוָ֥ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad [is] one

וְאָ֣הַבְתָּ֔ <S%H157><s%> ve-'A-hav-ta, And thou shalt love אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all לְבָבְךָ֥ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-ve-Cha with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H5315><s%> naf-she-Cha and with all thy soul וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all מְאֹדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'o-De-cha. and with all thy might

וְהָי֞וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim And these words הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, These אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֧י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוְּךָ֛ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha which I command הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom thee this day עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon לְבָבֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Ve-cha. shall be in thine heart

וְשִׁנַּנְתָּ֣ם <S%H8150><s%> ve-shin-nan-Tam And thou shalt teach them diligently לְבָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H1121><s%> le-va-Nei-cha, unto thy children וְדִבַּרְתָּ֖ <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-bar-Ta and shalt talk בָּ֑ם Bam; בְּשִׁבְתְּךָ֤ <S%H3427><s%> be-shiv-te-Cha of them when thou sittest בְּבֵיתֶ֙ךָ֙ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-Te-cha in thine house וּבְלֶכְתְּךָ֣ <S%H1980><s%> u-ve-lech-te-Cha walk בַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> vad-De-rech, by the way וּֽבְשָׁכְבְּךָ֖ <S%H7901><s%> u-ve-sha-che-be-Cha and when thou liest down וּבְקוּמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6965><s%> u-ve-ku-Me-cha. and when thou risest up

וּקְשַׁרְתָּ֥ם <S%H7194><s%> u-ke-shar-Tam And thou shalt bind לְא֖וֹת <S%H226><s%> le-'ot them for a sign עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on יָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-De-cha; upon thine hand וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu shall be as לְטֹטָפֹ֖ת <S%H2903><s%> le-to-ta-Fot and they shall be as frontlets בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein among עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-cha. between thine eyes

וּכְתַבְתָּ֛ם <S%H3789><s%> u-che-tav-Tam And thou shalt write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on מְזוּזֹ֥ת <S%H4201><s%> me-zu-Zot them upon the posts בֵּיתֶ֖ךָ <S%H1004><s%> bei-Te-cha of thy house וּבִשְׁעָרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H8179><s%> u-vish-'a-Rei-cha. and on thy gates ס sa-Mek

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah shall come כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki when יְבִיאֲךָ֣׀ <S%H935><s%> ye-vi-'a-Cha shall have brought יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And it shall be when the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz thee into the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֧ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tei-cha unto thy fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham to Abraham לְיִצְחָ֥ק <S%H3327><s%> le-yitz-Chak to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> u-le-ya-'a-Ko and to Jacob לָ֣תֶת <S%H5414><s%> La-tet to give לָ֑ךְ Lach; עָרִ֛ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim cities גְּדֹלֹ֥ת <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lot thee great וְטֹבֹ֖ת <S%H2896><s%> ve-to-Vot and goodly אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not בָנִֽיתָ׃ <S%H1129><s%> va-Ni-ta. which thou buildedst

וּבָ֨תִּ֜ים <S%H1004><s%> u-Vat-Tim And houses מְלֵאִ֣ים <S%H4392><s%> me-le-'Im full כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all טוּב֮ <S%H2898><s%> tuv of all good אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not מִלֵּאתָ֒ <S%H4390><s%> mil-le-Ta [things] which thou filledst וּבֹרֹ֤ת <S%H953><s%> u-vo-Rot not and wells חֲצוּבִים֙ <S%H2672><s%> cha-tzu-Vim digged אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not חָצַ֔בְתָּ <S%H2672><s%> cha-Tzav-ta, which thou diggedst כְּרָמִ֥ים <S%H3754><s%> ke-ra-Mim not vineyards וְזֵיתִ֖ים <S%H2132><s%> ve-zei-Tim and olive trees אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not נָטָ֑עְתָּ <S%H5193><s%> na-Ta-'e-ta; which thou plantedst וְאָכַלְתָּ֖ <S%H398><s%> ve-'a-chal-Ta not when thou shalt have eaten וְשָׂבָֽעְתָּ׃ <S%H7646><s%> ve-sa-Va-'e-ta. and be full

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <S%H8104><s%> hish-Sha-mer [Then] beware לְךָ֔ le-Cha, פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- not תִּשְׁכַּ֖ח <S%H7911><s%> tish-Kach lest thou forget אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הוֹצִֽיאֲךָ֛ <S%H3318><s%> ho-tzi-'a-Cha which brought thee forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit from the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dim. of bondage

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God תִּירָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra Thou shalt fear וְאֹת֣וֹ <S%H853><s%> ve-'o-To תַעֲבֹ֑ד <S%H5647><s%> ta-'a-Vod; and serve וּבִשְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> u-vish-Mo by his name תִּשָּׁבֵֽעַ׃ <S%H7650><s%> tish-sha-Ve-a'. him and shalt swear

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תֵֽלְכ֔וּן <S%H1980><s%> te-le-Chun, along אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim; other מֵאֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> me-'e-lo-Hei of the gods הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim, of the people אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-vo-tei-Chem. which [are] round about

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> 'el God קַנָּ֛א <S%H7067><s%> kan-Na [is] a jealous יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh (For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בְּקִרְבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-Be-cha; among פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- otherwise יֶ֠חֱרֶה <S%H2734><s%> Ye-che-reh be kindled אַף־ <S%H639><s%> 'af- you) lest the anger יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בָּ֔ךְ Bach, וְהִשְׁמִ֣ידְךָ֔ <S%H8045><s%> ve-hish-Mi-de-cha, against thee and destroy מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al and פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei thee from off the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah. of the earth ס sa-Mek

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תְנַסּ֔וּ <S%H5254><s%> te-nas-Su, Ye shall not tempt אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem; your God כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after נִסִּיתֶ֖ם <S%H5254><s%> nis-si-Tem as ye tempted בַּמַּסָּֽה׃ <S%H4532><s%> bam-mas-Sah. [him] in Massah

שָׁמ֣וֹר <S%H8104><s%> sha-Mor Ye shall diligently תִּשְׁמְר֔וּן <S%H8104><s%> tish-me-Run, keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִצְוֹ֖ת <S%H4687><s%> mitz-Vot the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem; your God וְעֵדֹתָ֥יו <S%H5713><s%> ve-'e-do-Tav and his testimonies וְחֻקָּ֖יו <S%H2706><s%> ve-chuk-Kav and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוָּֽךְ׃ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vach. which he hath commanded

וְעָשִׂ֛יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt do הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> hai-ya-Shar [that which is] right וְהַטּ֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> ve-hat-Tov and good בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an that it יִ֣יטַב <S%H3190><s%> Yi-tav that it may be well לָ֔ךְ Lach, וּבָ֗אתָ <S%H935><s%> u-Va-ta, with thee and that thou mayest go in וְיָֽרַשְׁתָּ֙ <S%H3423><s%> ve-ya-rash-Ta and possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz land הַטֹּבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> hat-to-Vah, the good אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' sware יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tei-cha. unto thy fathers
